processingCommand.script:
! Configure Modules
:DEFINE &AMODULES#, string, 20
:FILL &AMODULES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&MODULES#", ",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AMODULES#[])

:SET &WMS_CONF#          = "false"
:SET &REFS_CONF#         = "false"
:SET &RW_CONF#           = "false"
:SET &EMS_CONF#          = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_CONF#     = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_CONF#    = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_CONF#      = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_CONF#     = "false"

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS"
:      SET &WMS_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS"
:      SET &REFS_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW"
:      SET &RW_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS"
:      SET &EMS_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS-FAIL"
:      SET &WMS_FAIL_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS-FAIL"
:      SET &REFS_FAIL_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW-FAIL"
:      SET &RW_FAIL_CONF# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS-FAIL"
:      SET &EMS_FAIL_CONF# = "true"
:  ENDSWITCH
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:PUBLISH &WMS_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_CONF#,,WORKFLOW
